meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Herschel Purvis Erik Agard Alan Dunn Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7845.

td.p: Herschel Purvis, a laboratory technician from Los Angeles, California
Erik Agard, a puzzlemaker from Gaithersburg, Maryland
Alan Dunn, a software development manager from Johns Creek, Georgia (whose 5-day cash winnings total $120,802)

tr.td: HANGING WITH FAMOUS PEOPLE
TIMELY PHRASES
WHERE THERE'S SMOKE
THE 1980s
STATE LINES
C'EST LA TV

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Sarah of the Clue Crew presents from the Plokstine Cold War Museum in Lithuania.) The silos at Lithuania's Plokstine missile base that once housed Soviet SS-4 rockets are empty; the missiles were destroyed under terms of this treaty, signed in 1987 by Gorbachev & Reagan & known by three letters for short

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
